column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The best deep dish pizza
column2: ever. I know everyone has their preference but after trying several different places in Chicago
column3: Lou's is the official winner. The pizza is perfection. From crust to the sausage
column4: everything is exceptional. Salads are also very good. Much better than a little salad you would expect at most pizza places. The one we had reminded me of the maggianos house salad with prosciutto and Gorgonzola. The perfect accompaniment to pizza.
